mapper.select: SELECT A.VACATION_REQUEST_ID , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.CREATED_AT , A.REQUEST_REASON , A.REQUEST_STATUS , A.REJECTION_REASON , A.CANCELED_AT , A.CANCEL_REASON , A.CANCEL_STATUS , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , B.NAME , A.VACATION_ID , C.VACATION_REQUEST_FILE_ID , C.FILE_NAME , C.FILE_URL FROM VACATION_REQUEST A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMPLOYEE_ID = B.EMPLOYEE_ID LEFT JOIN VACATION_REQUEST_FILE C ON A.VACATION_REQUEST_ID = C.VACATION_REQUEST_ID WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } ORDER BY A.VACATION_REQUEST_ID DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT A.VACATION_REQUEST_ID , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.CREATED_AT , A.REQUEST_REASON , A.REQUEST_STATUS , A.REJECTION_REASON , A.CANCELED_AT , A.CANCEL_REASON , A.CANCEL_STATUS , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , B.NAME , A.VACATION_ID , C.VACATION_REQUEST_FILE_ID , C.FILE_NAME , C.FILE_URL FROM VACATION_REQUEST A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMPLOYEE_ID = B.EMPLOYEE_ID LEFT JOIN VACATION_REQUEST_FILE C ON A.VACATION_REQUEST_ID = C.VACATION_REQUEST_ID WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND YEAR(A.CREATED_AT) = YEAR(#{ date }) AND MONTH(A.CREATED_AT) = MONTH(#{ date }) ORDER BY A.VACATION_REQUEST_ID DESC LIMIT #{ elementsPerPage } OFFSET #{ offset }
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM VACATION_REQUEST A WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND YEAR(A.CREATED_AT) = YEAR(#{ date }) AND MONTH(A.CREATED_AT) = MONTH(#{ date })

SELECT A.VACATION_REQUEST_ID , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.CREATED_AT , A.REQUEST_REASON , A.REQUEST_STATUS , A.REJECTION_REASON , A.CANCELED_AT , A.CANCEL_REASON , A.CANCEL_STATUS , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , A.VACATION_ID FROM VACATION_REQUEST A WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.REQUEST_STATUS = 'ACCEPT' AND A.CANCEL_STATUS = 'N' AND CURRENT_DATE BETWEEN DATE(A.START_DATE) AND DATE(A.END_DATE)
